name: Ablative Barrier
components: V, S, M (a piece of metal cut from a shield)
text: Invisible layers of solid force surround and protect the target, granting that target a +2 armor bonus to AC. Additionally, the first 5 points of lethal damage the target takes from each attack are converted into nonlethal damage. Against attacks that already deal nonlethal damage, the target gains DR 5/—. Once this spell has converted 5 points of damage to nonlethal damage per caster level (maximum 50 points), the spell is discharged.
mythicText: Add half your tier to the spell’s armor bonus. Add half your tier to the amount of lethal damage from each attack that is converted to nonlethal damage and to the DR against nonlethal damage. Add half your tier to your caster level when determining how much damage the spell converts before it’s discharged.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 材料 (一片取自盾牌的金属)
duration_zh: 1小时/等级 或 直至能量发散
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh:
坚固而无形的盾牌环绕在目标周围为其提供防护，目标的AC获得+2护甲加值。

此外，目标每受到一次伤害，最开始的5点伤害会被转换成非致命伤害。

如果攻击本身即造成非致命伤害，那么目标对其有DR5/-的伤害减免。

一旦这个法术转换了每施法者等级5点非致命伤害 (最高50)，法术能量耗尽。
mythicText_zh: 将你的阶层的一半加到法术的护甲加值上。每次攻击中致命伤害向非致命伤害所转化的数量、对抗非致命伤害的DR均获得你的阶层一半的加值。在判断法术被耗尽之前能够转化的伤害数量时，将你的阶层的一半加到你的施法者等级上。
